titleInfo.title: Letter from Evelyn Baring, Private Secretary's Office, Government House, Simla to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the exact definition of 'native of India' including the official citation of its definition and its inclusion of Eurasian's within it.The letter also discusses the approval for Captain Percy William Powlett's appointment as Political Agent of the Second Class under the new appointments scheme approved by the Government of India, and explaining how promotions can now be granted without the promotee having to move posts.
